people_also_viewed.about: Co-Founder at Guardian Capital | Zomato | IIM L

projects: [{"title":"Code for India - Financial Literacy game","start_date":"May 2014","description":"Front end development - Modelling of game data in structured JSON data, HTML templating using Handlebar.js, User interfacing using Twitter bootstrap.js."},{},{},{"title":"Sleep Not Ok Please","start_date":"Mar 2014","description":"This was our winning hack in Linkedin India Hackday. Driver fatigue causes 1000s of deaths every year. The objective of our hack was to prevent these deaths by providing an alert to the driver whenever they doze off.The solution contains the following elements- An Android Application that has access to the Front (Selfie) camera in your phone- When turned-ON the application can either run on the foreground or as a service- The App would randomly capture images of the driver every 10s. - Using OpenCV for Android, we detect the position and state of the eye- If the eye is closed, the app would immediately trigger an alarm - A loud beep sound- The application can also be paired with smart watches (Pebble) to give a buzzing alert to the driver.This application makes sense as many people mount their smartphones in a dock to act as a Navigation assistant."},{}]

honors_and_awards.title: Winner of LinkedIn "India Hackday Bangalore 2014"
honors_and_awards.description: With more than 100,000 crashes and 1550 annual deaths in US caused during driving in fatigued/ lack of sleep conditions. Our team created an Android based application for detection of drowsy eyes of drivers and alerting them to prevent such accidents.
